 *

namespace blobfolio\phone\data;

class dataGW extends data {

	const CODE = 'GW';

	const PREFIX = 245;

	const REGION = 'Africa';

	const PATTERNS = array(
		'(?:4(?:0\d{5}|4\d{7})|9\d{8})',
	);

	const TYPES = array(
		'443\d{6}'=>array(
			'fixed',
		),
		'9(?:5\d|6[569]|77)\d{6}'=>array(
			'mobile',
		),
		'40\d{5}'=>array(
			'voip',
		),
	);

	const FORMATS = array(
		'(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
		'(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2',
	);

}
